desc.en: During a mission, Sensei is fleeing the Helmet Gang, and Akane steps in to save the day. After a greeting, Akane recalls how she and Sensei first met.

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.en: Kirino and Sensei arrive at the hostage situation earlier than the professional negotiator. Kirino tries to shoot her gun to subdue the criminal, but she accidentally hits a hostage. As the situation unravels, the criminal gets scared and releases the hostage.
desc.jp: Kirino and Sensei arrive at the hostage situation earlier than the professional negotiator. Kirino tries to shoot her gun to subdue the criminal, but she accidentally hits a hostage. As the situation unravels, the criminal gets scared and releases the hostage.
desc.zh_cn: 比专业谈判家早一步抵达人质事件现场的{cf桐乃}与老师。{cf桐乃}想用射击来压制犯人，但是却因为失误而瞄准了人质。因为意想不到的行动一直发生，犯人开始感到害怕而放了人质。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.en: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.jp: A Day in the Life of Serika

desc.en: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_cn: 老师和{cn对策委员会}学生们跟踪{cf茜香}，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是{cf茜香}依然一副没好气的样子。{cf茜香}在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。

desc.en: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.jp: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.zh_cn: 老师撞见了{cf茜香}，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。{cf茜香}躲闪着，但老师{cf步}{cf步}紧跟；{cf茜香}后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。

desc.en: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.jp: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十一首曲子，常在“招聘”（抽卡）页面播放。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Sensei brings the rest of the Foreclosure Task Force to the very ramen store that Serika is working for. Though surprised, Serika leads the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposes to pay with her cards, but Sensei does that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returns to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.jp: Sensei brings the rest of the Foreclosure Task Force to the very ramen store that Serika is working for. Though surprised, Serika leads the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposes to pay with her cards, but Sensei does that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returns to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.zh_cn: 老师带着{cn对策委员会}的其它人来到了{cf茜香}打工的拉面店，{cf茜香}大为震撼。然后，{cf茜香}带领大家就坐；之后，{cf野乃美}主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在{cf茜香}的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.zh_cn: 抵达黑市的{cn对策委员会}一行人遇上{sn三一}综合学园的学生，{cf日步美}。{cf日步美}是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。{cn对策委员会}一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。

desc.en: Having beat back the bullies, Hifumi and the Foreclosure Task Force leave the scene before an even bigger mess happens.
desc.jp: Having beat back the bullies, Hifumi and the Foreclosure Task Force leave the scene before an even bigger mess happens.
desc.zh_cn: 击败小流氓的{cf日步美}和{cn对策委员会}一行人，为了被卷入更大的骚动而离开现场。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is amazed by the scale of the market. Then everyone meets Hifumi, who is being chased by some bullies at that moment, and save her for good.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is amazed by the scale of the market. Then everyone meets Hifumi, who is being chased by some bullies at that moment, and save her for good.
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}一行人被黑市的规模之大所震惊。就在这时众人遇到了被混混追赶的{cf日步美}，顺手将其救下。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Everyone asks why she is being chased, and Hifumi answers that it is because of the limited edition of the Peroro plush. It is at this moment that the gangsters come back, and everyone starts to engage.
desc.jp: Everyone asks why she is being chased, and Hifumi answers that it is because of the limited edition of the Peroro plush. It is at this moment that the gangsters come back, and everyone starts to engage.
desc.zh_cn: 众人询问{cf日步美}为何被追，后者回答是为了买佩洛洛大人的限定版周边。就在这时刚刚被打倒的混混又回来了，众人开始作战。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.jp: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.zh_cn: 由于和{cn风纪委员会}的{cf亚子}交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。{cn对策委员会}决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的{cn风纪委员会}。

desc.en: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.jp: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.zh_cn: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长{cf阳奈}现身，针对此状况责问{cf亚子}。

desc.en: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.jp: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.zh_cn: 老师突然将视线与{cf遥香}的对上了。{cf遥香}对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。

desc.en: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.jp: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚子}首先为{cn风纪委员会}发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望{cn对策委员会}将{cn便利屋68}的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。{cf绫音}据理力争，而{cf亚子}则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有{et夏莱}的老师站在你们这边吧”。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Sensei expresses their opinions on Problem Solver 68, thinking that they aren't intentional. Most of the Foreclosure Task Force agree, but says it is still impossible to transfer for the identity of their backgrounds remained unknown.
desc.jp: Sensei expresses their opinions on Problem Solver 68, thinking that they aren't intentional. Most of the Foreclosure Task Force agree, but says it is still impossible to transfer for the identity of their backgrounds remained unknown.
desc.zh_cn: 老师表示了自己对便利屋的看法，认为他们不是故意的。{cn对策委员会}的大多数也同意，但表示因为还没找到幕后黑手，所以不能轻易交给{sn格黑娜}。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.jp: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.zh_cn: 谈判破裂，{cf亚子}打算继续攻击。然而{cn对策委员会}突然受到{cf遥香}的攻击，同时{cf佳世子}也开始逐步拆穿{cf亚子}的骗局：带大量兵力来{sn其他}自治区闹事绝非{cf阳奈}所为，实际上是{cf亚子}自己出兵；目标实际上是{et夏莱}，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。

desc.en: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚子}被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，{cn风纪委员会}担心{et夏莱}这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于{sn三一}的{cf日步美}将内容给了{cn茶会}，而{cn茶会}的情报又被{sn格黑娜}拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在{sn格黑娜}，顺带处理{cn便利屋68}。

desc.en: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.jp: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第82首曲子，特别用于日步美(日富美)的会议大厅中。

desc.en: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.
desc.jp: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.
desc.zh_cn: {cf佳世子}希望{cf亚瑠}尽快离开，但{cf亚瑠}不仅表示要战斗到底，{sn阿拜多斯}一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，{cf亚子}正式下达了战斗命令。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Ako is well aware of the risks but decides to proceed anyways. At this moment Hina connects onto the comm. Ako originally wants to take "on patrol" as an excuse, but Hina has already understood most of it and comes out in person.

desc.zh_cn: {cf亚子}自己也知道其中的风险，但还是决定一意孤行。就在这时{cf阳奈}接入通讯，{cf亚子}本想以“巡逻”等借口搪塞过去，但{cf阳奈}已经清楚了大部分事宜，并亲自来到了现场。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.jp: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}去见{cn研讨会}的部长{cf莉音}。两人在谈论先前{cn游戏开发部}与{cnC&C}发生的事，并且针对{cf爱丽丝}的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于{cf爱丽丝}立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来{cf阳葵}遭到某人的袭击。

desc.en: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.
desc.jp: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}与{cf阳葵}秘密会见，开始了对当前情况的梳理。

hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Rio and Himari plotted the conflict between the Game Development Department and C&C, and found out Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.jp: Rio and Himari plotted the conflict between the Game Development Department and C&C, and found out Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}和{cf阳葵}共同策划了{cn游戏开发部}与{cnC&C}的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了{cf爱丽丝}的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，{cf莉音}认为{cf爱丽丝}是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而{cf阳葵}则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。

desc.en: Himari insisted on her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and the AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.jp: Himari insisted on her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and the AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}固守着自己的结论，与{cf莉音}产生了严重分歧。{cf莉音}试图用AMAS将{cf阳葵}困住，但{cf阳葵}轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。

desc.en: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.jp: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.

desc.en: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.jp: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.zh_cn: {cf季}原以为{cf宁瑠}会独自去拯救{cf爱丽丝}，包含{cf宁瑠}在内的所有{cnC&C}成员都开始和{cf季}交战。{cn游戏开发部}一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往{et埃里都}的中心。

desc.en: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.jp: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.zh_cn: {cf季}表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和{cnC&C}这边的行动，奉劝{cnC&C}不要再做无谓抵抗。但{cnC&C}佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，{cf季}傲慢地向{cnC&C}解析了他们的行动计划，认为{cf宁瑠}会随老师一起；但这并非事实。

desc.en: Rio's victory is sealed in front of Himari, but Himari succeeds in escaping with Eimi's help. Meanwhile, cut off from Veritas's support, the Game Development Department find themselves with their backs against the wall until they are dramatically rescued by Chihiro, the vice president of Veritas.
desc.jp: Rio's victory is sealed in front of Himari, but Himari succeeds in escaping with Eimi's help. Meanwhile, cut off from Veritas's support, the Game Development Department find themselves with their backs against the wall until they are dramatically rescued by Chihiro, the vice president of Veritas.
desc.zh_cn: 就在{cf莉音}笃定自己能获胜时，{cf阳葵}在{cf英美}的协助下成功脱逃了。另一方面，少了{cn贝里塔斯}支持的{cn游戏开发部}面临空前的危机，{cn贝里塔斯}的副部长{cf千寻}在紧要关头戏剧性地出现了。

desc.en: Neru and Toki were at a deadlock. The GDD was no match of the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: Neru and Toki were at a deadlock. The GDD was no match of the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_cn: {cf宁瑠}与{cf季}陷入僵局，争执不下。{cn游戏开发部}一行人不敌前卫君。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Rio described the current situation. Himari expressed her approval of the cleverness of Rio's plan, saying that "maybe you're right", but still disagreed with Rio's original intent. Himari said her "never-looking-back" personality was both an advantage and a disadvantage. She asked Rio "whether she had ever talked to other people or not?" Rio was very confused when the prison was attacked.
desc.jp: Rio described the current situation. Himari expressed her approval of the cleverness of Rio's plan, saying that "maybe you're right", but still disagreed with Rio's original intent. Himari said her "never-looking-back" personality was both an advantage and a disadvantage. She asked Rio "whether she had ever talked to other people or not?" Rio was very confused when the prison was attacked.
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}向{cf阳葵}讲述了自己计划的当前进度。{cf阳葵}对{cf莉音}计划的高明表示认可、“或许是对的”，但仍不同意{cf莉音}的本来目的。{cf阳葵}表示{cf莉音}“头也不回”的特质既是优点也是缺点，并反问{cf莉音}“是否有与{sn其他}人交谈过”。{cf莉音}正在迷惑之际，监狱突然遭到攻击。

hobby.zh_cn_jp: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her calculation It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.jp: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her calculation It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}大为震惊，怀疑究竟是谁脱离了她的计算。原来是{cf阳葵}社团里的后辈{cf英美}前来救援，虽然理由仅仅是为了和部长共享布丁。{cf英美}承认这么做对{sn其他}人意义并不是很大，但{cf阳葵}则表示她信任她的后辈们。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.en: As the Veritas were frustrated by the fact that the communication was cut off unexpectedly and unable to connect, everyone found a screen monitor was displaying something.
desc.jp: As the Veritas were frustrated by the fact that the communication was cut off unexpectedly and unable to connect, everyone found a screen monitor was displaying something.
desc.zh_cn: 就在{cn贝里塔斯}因通讯被意外中断、无论如何都无法连接上，无从下手而抓狂时，所有人却突然发现屏幕有了动静。

desc.en: While engaging the Avant Guard, the GDD noticed its behaviour was looking strangely sluggish all of a sudden. Then, Chihiro from Veritas recovered the communication.
desc.jp: While engaging the Avant Guard, the GDD noticed its behaviour was looking strangely sluggish all of a sudden. Then, Chihiro from Veritas recovered the communication.

desc.en: 主要成員集合的學園附近大致上已經整頓好了，但小春在遺蹟地帶附近陷入苦戰當中。茶會的彌香突然登場，讓戰況開始出現了逆轉。
desc.jp: 主要成員集合的學園附近大致上已經整頓好了，但小春在遺蹟地帶附近陷入苦戰當中。茶會的彌香突然登場，讓戰況開始出現了逆轉。
desc.zh_cn: 主要成员集合的学园附近大致上已经整顿好了，但{cf小春}在遗迹地带附近陷入苦战当中。{cn茶会}的{cf弥香}突然登场，让战况开始出现了逆转。

desc.en: 小春等實現正義部的成員都向彌香道謝。
desc.jp: 小春等實現正義部的成員都向彌香道謝。
desc.zh_cn: {cf小春}等{cn实现正义部}的成员都向{cf弥香}道谢。

desc.en: 雖然一邊已經打完了戰鬥，但聖亞感覺到教堂附近還有人沒有撤離。蓮實讓麻白確認情況，果真如此。
desc.jp: 雖然一邊已經打完了戰鬥，但聖亞感覺到教堂附近還有人沒有撤離。蓮實讓麻白確認情況，果真如此。
desc.zh_cn: 虽然一边已经打完了战斗，但{cf圣亚}感觉到教堂附近还有人没有撤离。{cf莲实}让{cf麻白}确认情况，果真如此。

desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

desc.en: 老師的腦海中如同跑馬燈一般，短暫浮現了另一個可能發生的故事。啟航的生命守護者瞬間陷入危機當中。
desc.jp: 老師的腦海中如同跑馬燈一般，短暫浮現了另一個可能發生的故事。啟航的生命守護者瞬間陷入危機當中。
desc.zh_cn: 老师的脑海中如同跑马灯一般，短暂浮现了另一个可能发生的故事。启航的生命守护者瞬间陷入危机当中。

desc.en: 老師回到了與會長在火車上的那一刻。會長對自己的行為抱歉，表示直到最後的這時，才意識到老師是對的，並希望老師能夠接下她的爛攤子。
desc.jp: 老師回到了與會長在火車上的那一刻。會長對自己的行為抱歉，表示直到最後的這時，才意識到老師是對的，並希望老師能夠接下她的爛攤子。
desc.zh_cn: 老师回到了与会长在火车上的那一刻。会长对自己的行为抱歉，表示直到最后的这时，才意识到老师是对的，并希望老师能够接下她的烂摊子。

desc.en: 會長因不明原因負傷。會長繼續向老師講述，即便無法回憶起任何東西，但她相信老師能在同樣的情況下，做出同樣的選擇；她相信，這些選擇唯有老師能夠做到。會長又提到了揹負責任之人的話題。她說雖然那時的她尚不理解，但現在她理解了老師，以及在選擇的延長線上的，更多的選擇。
desc.jp: 會長因不明原因負傷。會長繼續向老師講述，即便無法回憶起任何東西，但她相信老師能在同樣的情況下，做出同樣的選擇；她相信，這些選擇唯有老師能夠做到。會長又提到了揹負責任之人的話題。她說雖然那時的她尚不理解，但現在她理解了老師，以及在選擇的延長線上的，更多的選擇。
desc.zh_cn: 会长因不明原因负伤。会长继续向老师讲述，即便无法回忆起任何东西，但她相信老师能在同样的情况下，做出同样的选择；她相信，这些选择唯有老师能够做到。会长又提到了背负责任之人的话题。她说虽然那时的她尚不理解，但现在她理解了老师，以及在选择的延长线上的，更多的选择。

name.en: 如果你是我所能信任之人
name.jp: 如果你是我所能信任之人
name.zh_cn: 如果你是我所能信任之人

desc.en: 【過場動畫播放，似乎暗示了兩條時間線上截然不同的結局】會長在最後拜託老師將這個故事扭曲且令人不悅的終點改寫，重新做出選擇。
desc.jp: 【過場動畫播放，似乎暗示了兩條時間線上截然不同的結局】會長在最後拜託老師將這個故事扭曲且令人不悅的終點改寫，重新做出選擇。
desc.zh_cn: 【过场动画播放，似乎暗示了两条时间线上截然不同的结局】会长在最后拜托老师将这个故事扭曲且令人不悦的终点改写，重新做出选择。

desc.en: 會長希望老師能將他們走過的日子和與他們之間的所有回憶都一併珍藏——但話都沒說完就被打斷。
desc.jp: 會長希望老師能將他們走過的日子和與他們之間的所有回憶都一併珍藏——但話都沒說完就被打斷。
desc.zh_cn: 会长希望老师能将他们走过的日子和与他们之间的所有回忆都一并珍藏——但话都没说完就被打断。

desc.en: 生命守護者戰艦出現嚴重情況，老師突然驚醒。花子報告戰艦所處的狀態與方舟不一致。優香以為是系統錯誤，但莉音則指出是方舟主動改變了狀態――眾人意識到，他們所做的一切，又化為了虛無。
desc.jp: 生命守護者戰艦出現嚴重情況，老師突然驚醒。花子報告戰艦所處的狀態與方舟不一致。優香以為是系統錯誤，但莉音則指出是方舟主動改變了狀態――眾人意識到，他們所做的一切，又化為了虛無。
desc.zh_cn: 生命守护者战舰出现严重情况，老师突然惊醒。{cf花子}报告战舰所处的状态与方舟不一致。{cf优香}以为是系统错误，但{cf莉音}则指出是方舟主动改变了状态――众人意识到，他们所做的一切，又化为了虚无。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 成功擊退包圍船的敵人後，白子隨著爆炸出現在老師的面前。同一時間，對策委員會的所有人都出現在白子的面前，白子有些驚訝且立刻逃走了。在防禦生命守護者主艦的同時，也展開了阿特拉哈西斯方舟的佔領戰。
desc.jp: 成功擊退包圍船的敵人後，白子隨著爆炸出現在老師的面前。同一時間，對策委員會的所有人都出現在白子的面前，白子有些驚訝且立刻逃走了。在防禦生命守護者主艦的同時，也展開了阿特拉哈西斯方舟的佔領戰。
desc.zh_cn: 成功击退包围船的敌人后，{cf白子}随着爆炸出现在老师的面前。同一时间，{cn对策委员会}的所有人都出现在{cf白子}的面前，{cf白子}有些惊讶且立刻逃走了。在防御生命守护者主舰的同时，也展开了阿特拉哈西斯方舟的占领战。

desc.en: 戰鬥非常成功，但就在眾人以為一切結束時，爆炸突然發生在船艦內。
desc.jp: 戰鬥非常成功，但就在眾人以為一切結束時，爆炸突然發生在船艦內。
desc.zh_cn: 战斗非常成功，但就在众人以为一切结束时，爆炸突然发生在船舰内。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 另一位白子對老師居然能到達這裡感到驚奇，但同時也警告老師。綾音大聲叫喊，讓對策委員會一行人前來抓住白子，但白子見狀後以手榴彈為掩護，立刻跑掉了。
desc.jp: 另一位白子對老師居然能到達這裡感到驚奇，但同時也警告老師。綾音大聲叫喊，讓對策委員會一行人前來抓住白子，但白子見狀後以手榴彈為掩護，立刻跑掉了。
desc.zh_cn: 另一位{cf白子}对老师居然能到达这里感到惊奇，但同时也警告老师。{cf绫音}大声叫喊，让{cn对策委员会}一行人前来抓住{cf白子}，但{cf白子}见状后以手榴弹为掩护，立刻跑掉了。

realname.en: !⸮ WAS IT A CAT I SAW ?!
realname.jp: !⸮ WAS IT A CAT I SAW ?!

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: 莉音敏銳地感覺出另一位白子的實時位置跳躍似乎是依靠方舟強大的計算能力所實現，因而只要保住它的計算能力，製作出一個空間跳躍程式並不是問題。她繼而指出，這樣就能讓所有人安全回到地面。
desc.jp: 莉音敏銳地感覺出另一位白子的實時位置跳躍似乎是依靠方舟強大的計算能力所實現，因而只要保住它的計算能力，製作出一個空間跳躍程式並不是問題。她繼而指出，這樣就能讓所有人安全回到地面。

desc.en: 陽葵讀出了莉音的意思：她自己似乎也無法修復這艘船。陽葵表示莉音這種心態就像之前提到過的那位國王一般，因他自己對他人的不信任而引發了諸多問題。莉音表示同意，但同時說這點恐怕很難改變；陽葵則澄清她只是純粹討厭，並非鄙視。
desc.jp: 陽葵讀出了莉音的意思：她自己似乎也無法修復這艘船。陽葵表示莉音這種心態就像之前提到過的那位國王一般，因他自己對他人的不信任而引發了諸多問題。莉音表示同意，但同時說這點恐怕很難改變；陽葵則澄清她只是純粹討厭，並非鄙視。
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}读出了{cf莉音}的意思：她自己似乎也无法修复这艘船。{cf阳葵}表示{cf莉音}这种心态就像之前提到过的那位国王一般，因他自己对他人的不信任而引发了诸多问题。{cf莉音}表示同意，但同时说这点恐怕很难改变；{cf阳葵}则澄清她只是纯粹讨厌，并非鄙视。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.jp: Iori and Chinatsu believe that Hina must be informed of the current situation, but Ako strongly disagrees, claiming that it would ruin Hina's vacation. She says for Hina's sake, this situation should be resolved only among the Prefect Team and Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 预想可能会有比想像中还要大规模的全面战争，大家烦恼着是否该通知{cf阳奈}委员长，但{cf亚子}极力反对。鉴于目前的战斗力，认为他们应该能独自应付此情况，宣布继续作战。另一方面，{cf阳奈}说这是他第一次近距离看海，并将目光看向老师的方向……

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?

desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Just when Hina's vacation is back on track, countless troublemakers begin to assemble. Hina appears just as Ako is overwhelmed and at a loss.
desc.jp: Just when Hina's vacation is back on track, countless troublemakers begin to assemble. Hina appears just as Ako is overwhelmed and at a loss.
desc.zh_cn: 尽管{cn风纪委员会}竭尽全力让{cf阳奈}委员长有学习游泳的时间，但头盔团、{cn美食研究会}，甚至是{cn温泉开发部}都趁着风纪委员长不在的空档，将海边彻底变成了战场。就在{cf亚子}留着泪，准备放弃的时候，不知从哪里传来了{cf阳奈}的声音。

desc.jp: It's another new year in Kivotos. What kind of wishes will Problem Solver 68 make amidst the bustling crowds of the New Year's event?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯迎来了新年。早早就前往以「实现愿望的地方」闻名的地点的{cn便利屋68}竟然碰上了赛钱箱小偷！究竟他们的愿望将会如何呢……！？

desc.en: Wakamo suddenly attacks during Sensei's patrol. Luckily, Sensei is able to subdue Wakamo with the help of the Valkyrie Police School students and Sena. Sensei and Sena resume their patrol feeling that something is amiss.
desc.jp: Wakamo suddenly attacks during Sensei's patrol. Luckily, Sensei is able to subdue Wakamo with the help of the Valkyrie Police School students and Sena. Sensei and Sena resume their patrol feeling that something is amiss.
desc.zh_cn: 在老师运行巡逻工作的途中，{cf若藻}忽然现身袭击他，幸亏{cf瀬奈}和{sn女武神}警察学园的学生们及时赶到支持，老师才能顺利制服{cf若藻}。风波落幕后，老师一边压抑着心里那股说不上来的怪异感，一边和{cf瀬奈}再次投入巡逻工作当中。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?

desc.zh_cn:
为了成为正式的社团，{cn忍术研究部}决定协助{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}的交流会。
然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……
面对眼前各式各样的问题，少女们得出的答案究竟会是什么呢！？

desc.en: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.jp: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。

desc.en: Shizuko and the others arrive at an area said to be managed by the Black Tortoise Promenade of Shanhaijing. However, they find out that Date Meowru and the Kurogame Gang are managing the resort.

desc.zh_cn: {cf静子}们下一个前往的是「对一切要求代价的玄武使者们」的岛屿。那里似乎是，由{sn山海经}的{cn玄武商会}营运的渡假胜地。然而却因投诉而炎上，前往观看情况却发现，进行了不当费用的要求，也没有像样服务等等的凄惨状况。愤于恶质渡假胜地的{cf静子}，老师在旁告知了他们并非{cn玄武商会}而是黑龟组的事实。

desc.en: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.jp: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.zh_cn:
老师从{cn放学后的甜点部}的{cf千纱}那里收到了咨询的请求。
似乎和她的过去有关──
突然闯入平凡少女的日常生活，
这无法预测的故事，将会走向什么样的结局……！？

desc.en: The Halo Festival is just around the corner, and Yuuka and Noa reach out to Sensei when they experience one unexpected setback after another. Concerned that Yuuka is biting off more than she can chew to prepare for the event, Noa secretly asks Sensei for help with the field day's preparations.
desc.jp: The Halo Festival is just around the corner, and Yuuka and Noa reach out to Sensei when they experience one unexpected setback after another. Concerned that Yuuka is biting off more than she can chew to prepare for the event, Noa secretly asks Sensei for help with the field day's preparations.
desc.zh_cn: 老师从{cn研讨会}的{cf优香}和{cf乃爱}那里听说将要举办「晄轮大祭」，但却发生了意料之外的事故。庆典迫在眉前，{cf乃爱}担心{cf优香}太勉强自己，于是便背着{cf优香}拜托老师帮忙准备大运动会。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.jp: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯今年也迎来了圣诞节。这是所有人一同分享喜悦的神圣日子。在这样的日子里，{cn救护骑士团}仍一如既往地四处「救护」，让我们来一窥她们既日常又特别的一天吧～

desc.en: The Remedial Knights and the Justice Task Force figure out that they were duped by the thugs' schemes. The object at the center of it all? The Hellfire Chicken. When the thugs finally reveal their true colors, the Remedial Knights join forces with the Justice Task Force to subdue the criminals.
desc.jp: The Remedial Knights and the Justice Task Force figure out that they were duped by the thugs' schemes. The object at the center of it all? The Hellfire Chicken. When the thugs finally reveal their true colors, the Remedial Knights join forces with the Justice Task Force to subdue the criminals.
desc.zh_cn: {cn救护骑士团}与{cn实现正义部}终于明白自己是被混混的诡计所蒙骗，才会引起这场骚动的。造成骚动的主因就是「地狱火炸鸡」。为了对付露出真面目的混混，{cn救护骑士团}与{cn实现正义部}齐心协力压制混混。

desc.en: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...

desc.zh_cn: 年关将近，久违发现令人满足的名店「麻雀亭」的{cn美食研究会}，得知了该店正面临关门的危机……破天荒的{cn美食研究会}与{cf风华}交织而成的店铺重建闹剧──正式开幕！

desc.en: Trinity's relic—a relic that could make or break the Tea Party's political fortunes—is on a train headed to Gehenna! Ichika boards the train to retrieve the relic, where she encounters Gehenna's most wanted criminal...!
desc.jp: Trinity's relic—a relic that could make or break the Tea Party's political fortunes—is on a train headed to Gehenna! Ichika boards the train to retrieve the relic, where she encounters Gehenna's most wanted criminal...!
desc.zh_cn:
在将文物移送至{sn三一}的途中，{cf一花}和老师发现委托载运的列车正开往{sn其他}目的地。
匆忙搭上列车后，发现上头竟然有{sn格黑娜}的通缉犯──！？
究竟，大家能平安地将文物带回{sn三一}吗？

desc.en: Azusa summons Sensei to a gloomy area at the foot of a mountain. She gifts Sensei with chocolate in the shape of Skullman but is surprised when Sensei gobbles it up without much thought. However, upon hearing Sensei's unexpected words, Azusa finally breaks out into a smile.
desc.jp: Azusa summons Sensei to a gloomy area at the foot of a mountain. She gifts Sensei with chocolate in the shape of Skullman but is surprised when Sensei gobbles it up without much thought. However, upon hearing Sensei's unexpected words, Azusa finally breaks out into a smile.
desc.zh_cn: {cf梓}将老师约到一座幽静的山边，并且拿出一个骷髅人造型的巧克力送给他。见到老师不以为意地将一口将巧克力吞下肚，{cf梓}的表情瞬间有些僵硬。然而，在听到老师令人意外的解释后，{cf梓}的脸上终于露出了浅浅的笑容。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

hobby.jp: 身代わりの術、息を潜めること
